Message.En: Battle for Gritten Fort: Close Battle
Message.Jp: グリッテン砦攻防戦　戦況：接戦

Message.En:
The difficulty level has increased and it has
become a large-scale combat with a greater sense
of accomplishment. The number of strong enemy
soldiers has also increased. However, if we apply
our daily experience, it shouldn't be scary.
Remember the basics and pay attention to your
surroundings. It's all about coordination,
discerning your comrades' movements.
Message.Jp:
多少難易度が上がり手ごたえの増した大規模戦闘だ
敵兵にも強い個体が増えてきている
だが日ごろの経験を生かして望めば怖くないはず
基本を忘れず周囲に気を配れ
仲間の動きを見極めてこその連係だ

Message.En:
Escort Lise and defeat the enemy at the target
locations
Message.Jp: リズを護衛し、目標地点の敵を殲滅せよ

Message.En:
An Ambush Unit has appeared, offering a chance
for a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 急襲部隊が出現、戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the ambush unit you discovered and receive
a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した急襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Lured out the main force of the ambush unit. A
chance for War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 急襲部隊の本隊を誘い出した。戦功ボーナスのチャンス

Message.En:
Defeat the ambush unit you discovered and receive
a War Merit Bonus.
Message.Jp: 発見した急襲部隊を撃破で戦功ボーナス

Message.En:
Defeat the battalion commander and complete the
defense.
Message.Jp: 大隊長を撃破し、防衛を完遂せよ

Message.En:
Battle for Gritten Fort: Close Battle (Result
Reward)
Message.Jp: グリッテン砦攻防戦：接戦《リザルト報酬》
